custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: YMC
custom_nodes.title: ymc-node-as-x-type
custom_nodes.description: some comfyui custom nodes to set it as known type

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_EchoMimic
custom_nodes.description: You can using EchoMimic in comfyui,whitch Lifelike Audio-Driven Portrait Animations through Editable Landmark Conditioning

custom_nodes.author: Patricio Gonzalez Vivo
custom_nodes.title: GLSL Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collections of nodes to support GLSL shaders inside a workflow.

custom_nodes.author: MiaoshouAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Miaoshouai-Tagger
custom_nodes.description: A node helps with image tagging and caption based on Florence-2-base-PromptGen model.

custom_nodes.author: sn0w12
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Sn0w-Scripts
custom_nodes.description: A collection of nodes and improvements created for general ease and lora management. These are just nodes I made and found useful, they should work with most other nodes. Most nodes that take in a prompt are made with booru tags in mind and might not work as expected with other prompts.

custom_nodes.author: N3rd00d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Paint3D-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Paint3D Nodes is a custom ComfyUI node for 3D model texture inpainting based on [a/Paint3D](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2312.13913).

custom_nodes.author: JackEllie
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AI-Assistant
custom_nodes.description: Provides two additional preprocessors and a prompt organizing tool.[Original Project](https://github.com/tori29umai0123/AI-Assistant/blob/main/README.md?plain=1).

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-3D-MeshTool
custom_nodes.description: A simple 3D model processing tool within ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: APZmedia
custom_nodes.title: APZmedia Clean File Name Node
custom_nodes.description: The Clean File Name Node is a custom node for ComfyUI designed to process and sanitize text strings for use as valid file names. It replaces invalid characters with a user-specified character and truncates the resulting string to a defined length.

custom_nodes.author: Cyberschorsch
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Checkpoint Loader Config
custom_nodes.description: Provides a custom node to load config for sampler nodes from a yaml file.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Stable_Makeup
custom_nodes.description: You can apply makeup to the characters in comfyui

custom_nodes.author: ZHO-ZHO-ZHO
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-UltraEdit-ZHO
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial implementation of [a/UltraEdit](https://github.com/HaozheZhao/UltraEdit) (Diffusers) for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Indra's Mirror
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Documents
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Documents is a powerful extension for ComfyUI that enhances workflows with advanced document processing capabilities. It includes nodes for loading and parsing various document types (PDF, TXT, DOC, DOCX), converting PDF pages to images, splitting PDFs into individual pages, and selecting specific images from batches. Features include text extraction, image conversion, and seamless integration with existing ComfyUI projects.

custom_nodes.author: Expo
custom_nodes.title: LM Studio Image to Text Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates LM Studio's vision models to generate text descriptions of images. It provides a flexible and customizable way to add image-to-text capabilities to your ComfyUI workflows, working with LM Studio's local API.

custom_nodes.author: AIFSH
custom_nodes.title: CosyVoice-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: a comfyui custom node for [a/CosyVoice](https://github.com/FunAudioLLM/CosyVoice)

custom_nodes.author: leestuartx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GG
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-GG is a collection of ComfyUI nodes designed to enhance productivity in image processing workflows. This plugin provides a set of custom nodes that perform various image manipulations and metadata extractions to streamline your tasks.

custom_nodes.author: mgfxer
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FrameFX
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes for frame interpolation and video processing in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: injet-zhou
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_extra_api
custom_nodes.description: Add more endpoints to make easy for utilizing ComfyUI API.

custom_nodes.description:

custom_nodes.description: This extension provides nodes that allow experimentation with various elements (samplers, latent, activators, attenuator, scheulders, ...) of Stable Diffusion.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FilePathCreator
custom_nodes.description: The ComfyUI-FilePathCreator is a custom node extension for ComfyUI designed to generate dynamic filenames based on user-defined parameters. This node helps streamline the process of creating organized and timestamped filenames, ideal for saving output files in a structured manner.

custom_nodes.author: bluevisor
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_PS_Blend_Node
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a simple custom node for ComfyUI that implements familiar PS-style blend modes using PyTorch. The PSBlendNode allows you to blend two images together using a variety of blend modes and an opacity parameter.

custom_nodes.title: comfyui-common-util
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Init Layer Info Array, Added Layer Info To Array, Layer Info Array Fuse, Layer Image Seleted, Layer Images IPAdapter Advanced, Enhanced Random Light Source

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MARS5-TTS
custom_nodes.description: a comfyui custom node for [a/MARS5-TTS](https://github.com/Camb-ai/MARS5-TTS)

custom_nodes.author: MrSamSeen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SSStereoscope
custom_nodes.description: The SideBySide Node is a powerful tool designed for ComfyUI to generate stereoscopic images. It takes a base image and a corresponding depth map as inputs and produces a combined image that simulates a 3D effect when viewed with appropriate equipment.

custom_nodes.author: jroc22
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CSV-prompt-builder
custom_nodes.description: This is a simple node for creating prompts using a .csv file. I created this node as an easy way to output different prompts each time a workflow is run.

custom_nodes.author: ImmortalPie
custom_nodes.title: PonySwitch Node
custom_nodes.description: The PonySwitch node is a custom node for ComfyUI that modifies prompts based on a toggle switch and adds configurable pony tags.

custom_nodes.author: SEkINVR
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI SaveAS
custom_nodes.description:
This custom node for ComfyUI allows you to save images in multiple formats, including PNG, JPG, WebP, and ICO.
[w/ComfyUI-Save-Multi-Format is renamed to SaveAs. Remove previous one and reinstall to this.]

custom_nodes.author: Fuou Marinas
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FirstOrderMM
custom_nodes.description: Run [a/First Order Motion Model](https://github.com/AliaksandrSiarohin/first-order-model) for Image Animation in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: my-opencode
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_IndustrialMagick
custom_nodes.description:
[a/ImageMagick](https://imagemagick.org/index.php) nodes for ComfyUI. Adds nodes to call ImageMagick subprocesses from ComfyUI.
Requirements: [a/ImagMagick7](https://imagemagick.org/script/download.php), 'magick' command in your CLI environment.

custom_nodes.author: my-opencode
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_KSamplerTimer
custom_nodes.description: A custom node that returns the generation time of the KSampler. Intended for benchmarking or debugging.

custom_nodes.author: licyk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Restart-Sampler
custom_nodes.description: This extension is a node that directly expands the functionality of KSampler, rather than being in the form of a custom node. [w/Workflows created using this feature are not compatible with other users.]

custom_nodes.author: pamparamm
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Vectorscope CC
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI port of a wonderful extension [a/SD Webui Vectorscope CC by Haoming02](https://github.com/Haoming02/sd-webui-vectorscope-cc).
Based on (and probably incompatible with) [a/ComfyUI Diffusion Color Grading by Haoming02](https://github.com/Haoming02/comfyui-diffusion-cg).

custom_nodes.author: yuvraj108c
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI YoloNasPose Tensorrt
custom_nodes.description: This repo provides a ComfyUI Custom Node implementation of [a/YOLO-NAS-POSE](https://github.com/Deci-AI/super-gradients), powered by TensorRT for ultra fast pose estimation. It has been adapted to work with openpose controlnet (experimental)

custom_nodes.author: GreenLandisaLie
custom_nodes.title: AuraSR-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI implementation of [a/Aura-SR](https://github.com/fal-ai/aura-sr)
